description: The h3cMDCStateChangeToActive trap indicates that the MDC status has changed to active.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-MDC-MIB::h3cMDCStateChangeToActive H3C-MDC-MIB::h3cMDCIndex i 9999 H3C-MDC-MIB::h3cMDCName s EXAMPLE

description: MDC ID is used as MDCIndex, the value range of MDC ID depends on the device model.
MDCIndex cannot be modified after creation.
variables.name: H3C-MDC-MIB::h3cMDCIndex

description: Specifies the MDC name, a case-sensitive string of 1 to 15 characters.
The MDC name cannot be modified after creation.
variables.name: H3C-MDC-MIB::h3cMDCName

description: The h3cMDCStateChangeToInactive trap indicates that the MDC status has changed to inactive.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-MDC-MIB::h3cMDCStateChangeToInactive H3C-MDC-MIB::h3cMDCIndex i 9999 H3C-MDC-MIB::h3cMDCName s EXAMPLE

description: MDC ID is used as MDCIndex, the value range of MDC ID depends on the device model.
MDCIndex cannot be modified after creation.
variables.name: H3C-MDC-MIB::h3cMDCIndex

description: Specifies the MDC name, a case-sensitive string of 1 to 15 characters.
The MDC name cannot be modified after creation.
variables.name: H3C-MDC-MIB::h3cMDCName
